channel.title: Vitis Quinquangularis on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Vitis Quinquangularis on funPlantGenes

item.title: VqDUF642
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VqDUF642 Gene Name: DUF642 Genome: Species: Vitis quinquangularis Functional Descriptions: VqDUF642, a gene isolated from the Chinese grape Vitis quinquangularis, is involved in berry development and pathogen resistance.

item.title: VqMAPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_06s0004g03540 Gene Symbol: VqMAPK3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Vitis quinquangularis Functional Descriptions: VqMAPK3/VqMAPK6, VqWRKY33, and VqNSTS3 constitute a regulatory node in enhancing resistance to powdery mildew in grapevine.

item.title: VqMAPK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_05s0094g00900 Gene Symbol: VqMAPK6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Vitis quinquangularis Functional Descriptions: VqMAPK3/VqMAPK6, VqWRKY33, and VqNSTS3 constitute a regulatory node in enhancing resistance to powdery mildew in grapevine.

item.title: VqMYB154
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_11s0016g02780 Gene Symbol: VqMYB154 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 154 Genome: Species: Vitis quinquangularis Functional Descriptions: VqMYB154 promotes polygene expression and enhances resistance to pathogens in Chinese wild grapevine.
